name: PDFViewer
tagline: View bundled PDFs in a Cordova (iOS) app
body:
##The MIT License CDVPDFViewer Created by Randy McMillan on 7/25/13. Copyright RandyMcMillan.net 2013. All rights reserved. ####Add to www/index.html `` A sample index.html is included in the plugin repository ####Cordova (iOS) 3.0+ #####add to your config.xml ![image](https://raw.github.com/RandyMcMillan/PDFViewer/master/AddFilesToProject.png) ![image](https://raw.github.com/RandyMcMillan/PDFViewer/master/AddProjectsToProject2.png) ###Add files to the project ![image](https://raw.github.com/RandyMcMillan/PDFViewer/master/CopyJSToWWW.png) ![image](https://raw.github.com/RandyMcMillan/PDFViewer/master/CopyJSToWWW2.png) ###Copy CDVPDFViewer.js to your project's WWW folder ![image](https://raw.github.com/RandyMcMillan/PDFViewer/master/EditConfigXML.png) ###Edit the config.xml file ![image](https://raw.github.com/RandyMcMillan/PDFViewer/master/IndexHTML.png) Sample [index.html](https://raw.github.com/RandyMcMillan/PDFViewer/master/index.html) ![image](https://raw.github.com/RandyMcMillan/PDFViewer/master/MessageUI.png) Add MessageUI.framework to your project. This new version offers a new UI based on original source code here: [https://github.com/vfr/Reader](https://github.com/vfr/Reader)
Reference for additional usage ![image](https://raw.github.com/RandyMcMillan/PDFViewer/master/viewportrait.png) ![image](https://raw.github.com/RandyMcMillan/PDFViewer/master/viewportrait2.png) ![image](https://raw.github.com/RandyMcMillan/PDFViewer/master/ipadlandscapeview.png) ![image](https://raw.github.com/RandyMcMillan/PDFViewer/master/ipadlandscapeview2.png) ![image](https://raw.github.com/RandyMcMillan/PDFViewer/master/ipadlandscapeview3.png) ![image](https://raw.github.com/RandyMcMillan/PDFViewer/master/ipadlandscapeview4.png) ![image](https://raw.github.com/RandyMcMillan/PDFViewer/master/ipadlandscapeview5.png)
